meaningMnemonic:
You helped your city <kanji>prosper</kanji>, and a <kanji>light</kanji> shines out of you, so that the entire city can bask in your <vocabulary>glory</vocabulary>.

Don't confuse this with 光栄! With that one, light is shining on you, and you receive honor from it. With this, you made things prosper and the light came after, making you look glorious.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
